channel.title: 1234's Server Development
channel.description:
Development? Yeah. P.S. : I Don't give a shit on what people think about the name. [center][IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u41/deltadragons/MatrixServer.jpg[/img][/center] [center][size=17pt][b]Matrix server[/b][/size][/center] [center]For [b]coders :[/b] Comment : I will not be Mr.NiceGuy[/center] [center][code]Coding. Is it your thing : Name : Preferred name to be called : Age : MSN/Yahoo : Coding experience (how long) : Why you would like to code : Will you abandon us : Type of coding : [/code][/center] [center]For [b]Forum Moderators -[/b] Comment : I'll choose wisely[/center] [center][code]Foruming. Is it your thing : Name : Preferred name to be called : Age : MSN/Yahoo : Moderating experience (how long) : Why you would like to code : Will you abandon us :[/code][/center] [center]For [b]Server hoster -[/b] Comment : Yes, Only one and a reliable one.[/center] [center][code]Servers. Is it your thing : Name : Preferred name to be called : Age : MSN/Yahoo : Hosting experience (how long) : Why you would like to host this server : Will you abandon us :[/code][/center] [center]Before you start applying,I'd like to say our forums are Real SMF : [i][url=http://www.javatown.co.nr]Click here[/i], Sorry, I didn't mean to advertise.But our forums are there so..yeah.[/center] [center][b]Note : [/b]All approved applicants are required to join the forums as to keep in touch.[/center] [center]If you have been approved, your post will be quoted out and This picture will be in the post : [IMG]http://i188.photobucket.com/albums/z114/Shinsen_Soul/accept.jpg[/img][/center] [center]Same goes for a rejected applicant : [IMG]http://i188.photobucket.com/albums/z114/Shinsen_Soul/reject.jpg[/img][/center] [center]Thank you for viewing this post. [/center] [center][b]Our progress so far?[/b][/center] [center]
/* Update 1 : Added global objects Update 2 : Added Vengeance *Get 94 Mage then click Charge in spell book (level 80) and click on a killable npc it will cast vengeance. Update 3 : Added Skill Capes *Not entirely working Update 4 : Updated NPC exp received each hit Update 5 : Added NPC random drops Update 6 : Changed Max Lvl to 185 (skill 99) Update 7 : Added a little kick for new players Update 8 : Added Low level training area - ::lowtrain for admins Update 9 : Added new start area Update 10 : Added drops for low level training Update 11 : Added Middle level training area - ::test2 for admins Update 12 : Added drops for middle level training Update 13 : Lowered NPC HP in Middle train. */
[/center] [center]Here is some of my info : [/center] [center]Coding. Is it your thing : Yes Name : Timothy/1234 Preferred name to be called :1234 Age : 11 MSN/Yahoo : Confidential Coding experience (how long) : Since April '07 Why you would like to code : Why I don't know, would I work for myself? Will you abandon us : What do you mean by us which is me which is us? Type of coding : All except expert level java.[/center]

item.title: 1234's Server Development
item.dc:creator: @1234ideclareathumbwa 1234ideclareathumbwar
item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

[quote=“Monkey wacko, post:16, topic:144953”]name:Pwnm30rdi3 or monkey wacko
Preferred name to be called : Pwn or Pwnm30rdi3
Will you abandon us :Nope not ever!
How long have i been a coder?: Since i was 14-15… (about 3-4 years…)
Job?: Sever coder and Admin in forums/game i can host if i have to!
Moderating experience (how long) :what ever 39 days and 6 hours is… thats all the forums ive been mod/admin on total time online added together!
Foruming. Is it your thing : Yes ive made many forums and im a great mod/admin on forums!
exp in skill?:Great at coding!! A lot I’m admin on many Servers (yarnovascape, 80% homemade source by me and 2 other friends, admin on zunescape,mod on 3+other servers and a coder for project ds but there done so i need a new project) and i help servers grow as long as forums im great with advertising i worked for an advertising company for 8 months! I have a quad core linux server for server hosting currently not in-use and i can use it for your server! Also I Coded specials from scratch, fletching, cooking, slayer, runecrafting, custom magebook!!!
Time Zone: eastern United States
Time on computer each day: 5-7 hours
Msn: coolmanawesome1@hotmail.com
Age:17
Host time: 24/7
proof:I’m also good with graphics and i love to code I’m 17 almost 18 I’m very reliable and i can get you a dedicated website host from go daddy if needed with 100g storage and 1000g bandwidth and much more![/quote]

Your hosting method is… :

Sorry, No forum admin.

Game admin

Join the forums.

[quote=“planplan, post:17, topic:144953”]Forums Designer.
Work with XHTML, CSS, and alot of different various forums.

Foruming. Is it your thing :Yes.
Name :Kando2
Preferred name to be called :Hidden
Age :14
MSN/Yahoo :omuliz@hotmail.com
Moderating experience (how long) :900+days.
Why you would like to code :Yeah I’m an expert.
Will you abandon us :No thanks.[/quote]

I don’t need forum designers, sorry =P, I can handle the forum myself.I only need moderators.

Read full topic

item.title: 1234's Server Development
item.dc:creator: @1234ideclareathumbwa 1234ideclareathumbwar
item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

Development? Yeah.
P.S. : I Don’t give a shit on what people think about the name.

[center][/center]

[center][size=17pt]Matrix server[/size][/center]
[center]For coders : Comment : I will not be Mr.NiceGuy[/center]
[center]Coding. Is it your thing : Name : Preferred name to be called : Age : MSN/Yahoo : Coding experience (how long) : Why you would like to code : Will you abandon us : Type of coding : [/center]

[center]For Forum Moderators - Comment : I’ll choose wisely[/center]
[center]Foruming. Is it your thing : Name : Preferred name to be called : Age : MSN/Yahoo : Moderating experience (how long) : Why you would like to code : Will you abandon us :[/center]

[center]For Server hoster - Comment : Yes, Only one and a reliable one.[/center]
[center]Servers. Is it your thing : Name : Preferred name to be called : Age : MSN/Yahoo : Hosting experience (how long) : Why you would like to host this server : Will you abandon us :[/center]

[center]Before you start applying,I’d like to say our forums are Real SMF : [url=http://www.javatown.co.nr]Click here, Sorry, I didn’t mean to advertise.But our forums are there so…yeah.[/center]

[center]Note : All approved applicants are required to join the forums as to keep in touch.[/center]

[center]If you have been approved, your post will be quoted out and This picture will be in the post : [/center]

[center]Same goes for a rejected applicant : [/center]

[center]Thank you for viewing this post.

[/center]
[center]Our progress so far?[/center]
[center]

/*
Update 1 : Added global objects
Update 2 : Added Vengeance *Get 94 Mage then click Charge in spell book (level 80) and click on a killable npc it will cast vengeance.
Update 3 : Added Skill Capes *Not entirely working
Update 4 : Updated NPC exp received each hit
Update 5 : Added NPC random drops
Update 6 : Changed Max Lvl to 185 (skill 99)
Update 7 : Added a little kick for new players
Update 8 : Added Low level training area - ::lowtrain for admins
Update 9 : Added new start area
Update 10 : Added drops for low level training
Update 11 : Added Middle level training area - ::test2 for admins
Update 12 : Added drops for middle level training
Update 13 : Lowered NPC HP in Middle train.
*/
[/center]

[center]Here is some of my info : [/center]
[center]Coding. Is it your thing : Yes
Name : Timothy/1234
Preferred name to be called :1234
Age : 11
MSN/Yahoo : Confidential
Coding experience (how long) : Since April '07
Why you would like to code : Why I don’t know, would I work for myself?
Will you abandon us : What do you mean by us which is me which is us?
Type of coding : All except expert level java.[/center]

Read full topic
